author: {'steamid': '76561197993194999', 'num_games_owned': 761, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1582467323}
review:
Go Home Dinosaurs aurait pu être un tower defense sympatoche s'il n'avait pas laissé l'impression d'être sérieusement inachevé.

La bonne idée de départ de créer des tours avec des socles en forme de pièces de Tetris est excellente mais archi sous exploitée.

De plus, tout ce qui fait le charme du genre est ici quasiment absent : Les tours n'ont aucun upgrade possible, les différents costumes de marmotte, qui auraient pu varier le gameplay, n'ont pas d'autre intérêt que celui d'être esthétique (et encore c'est vite dit) et les dinos sont finalement peu variés. Bref, heureusement que le jeu est très court, ça nous évite d'avoir le temps de s'en lasser.

Dommage, parce que personnellement, j'accrochais pas mal aux graphismes mignonnets et à l'humour enfantin et gentillet.

A 10€, c'est clairement l'arnaque mais avec un -75% lors d'une solde Steam, ça peut passer le temps ou occuper votre petite sœur.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993316069', 'num_games_owned': 4938, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1658063030}
review:
I generally go into Tower Defense games with a negative attitude, expecting them to either be boring, broken, uninspired or just plain unfun. I shouldn't like Go Home Dinosaurs!, but I do. It's about as basic as a Tower Defense game gets, but it just clicks. The levels aren't always obviously easy or frustratingly difficult. The towers are interesting and you get to fight dinosaurs.
I still don't recommend this at full price, but if you enjoy Tower Defense, then pick this up when it goes on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991263703', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1383641059}
review: Tower defense muito divertido. Os únicos pontos negativos são a pouca quantidade de níveis, somente 60, dívididos entre três estágios e a duração de cada um, menos de 5 min. Se vc gosta de tower defense, mas não está com saco de ficar defendendo por 20 min só para o jogo mandar uma wave impossível no final e vc ter que repetir este processo mais umas cinco vezes até descobrir a formação correta de torres (Super Sanctum TD que o diga), este é o jogo. Cada torre tem o formato de uma peça de tetris e vc tem que escolher bem aonde encaixá-las para tirar o melhor proveito e causar o maior estrago. Gostei bastante do humor do jogo, com várias piadinhas infames. O áudio e os gráficos não deixam a desejar, sendo que algumas músicas lembram o estílo músical do jogo Gunbound. Penso que se tivessem feito algo mais grandioso, em nível de Plants vs Zombies, por exemplo, Go Home Dinosaurs poderia ter sido sensacional. Para isso que servem as continuações e espero que façam uma. PS: Recomendo que leiam os achievemenst que você só ganha se completar alguns níveis de forma específica e acabam servindo como challenges adicicionais depois que zerar o jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037197299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1429564649}
review: This is a casual tower defense game that you play as squirrels and have to protect the barbeques from dinosaurs.  The game has some nice upgrades as you getting to other places. You can still win the hordes of dinos with wasting of defenders even you could use another type of them who could be more effective. This game is maybe targeted to kids concept wise but also older people can play this game aswell. If you are looking for a simple tower defense game and the childish humor doesnt matter for you then you can buy this game after a price drop it will not cost more than a drink in a bar. Usually i m not playing tower defense games because they are complicated and take time to learn, but this one is definately something that could get to those type of games as a ``beginning drug``. Give it a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024851774', 'num_games_owned': 3212, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 865, 'last_played': 1383360539}
review:
This...... recommends for kids under 12.
Exception: Over 12 but have a child's heart.

This game is little unique from other tower defense games. Your must arrange and allocate your defense towers in proper location like Tetris, a famous puzzle game. That is funny. I say it suitable to kids doesn't mean it is simple. On the contrary, some levels are quite challenging. But apart from that, this game lacks replayability once you gain perfectly 3 steaks in all the levels. It have neither endless mode like Orcs Must die 2! nor limited sources and towers like Defense Grid. But its art style is cute. You even can purchase carrot in game to substitute for default steak as the reward for completing a level. What a thoughtful and sweet design! I guess kids like steak more than carrot though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018278636', 'num_games_owned': 1296, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 975, 'last_played': 1380882393}
review: Half-Life, Mass Effect, Fallout 3, Skyrim..in die Reihe der großen Spiele unserer Zeit reiht sich nun ein weiterer würdevoller Vertreter. Die Rede ist natürlich von "Go home Dinosaurs" - dem ersten Tower-Defence-Game, bei dem man einen Grill gegen heranstürmende, hungrige Dinos verteidigt. Prachtvolle, bunte Grafik im Comic-Style, eine einfache, aber immer wieder motivierende Spielemechanik und effektvolle Verteidigungsanlagen machen dieses Spiel zu einem echten Highlight. Das Sahnehäubchen, die Barbeque-Sauce dieser Gaming-Köstlichkeit: die intelligente, liebevolle Sprachausgabe. Jede Verteidigungsanlage hat verschiedene, eigene Sprüche auf Lager. Da sagt der Eismann, der die Dinos verlangsamt, bspw.: "I C Dinos. Get it?! I C Dinos." oder die Kinder, die mit Schneebällen werfen: "First the ugly one. - They are all ugly." Wer von soviel Charme nicht hingerissen  ist, dem ist wohl auch nicht mehr zu helfen. Ich habe jedenfalls alle Achievements freigespielt. Ein wunderbares, kleines Gelegenheitsspiel, das es gerade für leckere 2,50 € gibt. Lasst es euch schmecken!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971482266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3018, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1444238282}

author: {'steamid': '76561198055863702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 841, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 834, 'last_played': 1380395593}
review:
This tower defense game will remind you of «Plants vs. Zombies» while playing and of «Angry Birds» while watching short "movies". Sometimes it's fun and thoughtful, but there are some demerits that spoil everything.
Many levels are just too easy, especially at the beginning, where more than an hour you will feel yourself a king. A bored one. Sometimes you may use the same tactics for 5 levels in a row without feeling yourself uncomfortable.
The worst thing is that achievement called «Go Home Dinosaurs», which says you must vanquish 10.000 enemies. It's like saying "hey, man, don't you want to complete this game twice?"
It's still nice, but could have been much better.
64 out of 100.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058519927', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1378144430}
review: I thought this was going to be the most childish game ever, but it definitely has a place for the adults.  It's a mix of Tetris and Tower Defense and while there is no leveling up your towers or even selling your towers for that matter, this game comes off as strategic and enjoyable.  I liked it and while it isn't the best tower defense game out there, it is easily worth the cost it is asking for.  If you haven't played this yet, fire it up.  It'll take you 3 hours max to beat and if you are a player who plays in small increments (get a few games in while dinner is on, in-between work, whatever), play this.  It's good.

review:
Don't let the strange name fool you, this one's actually a lot of fun. I initially bought it for cards but ended up having a great time. As far as Tower Defense games go, it doesn't have much depth, but the game makes up for it with challenging levels that require you to refine your strategy on some of the harder levels.

Overall, I'd say, for $2.50 you can't go wrong buying this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969734130', 'num_games_owned': 855, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1105, 'last_played': 1608701584}
review: Go Home Dinosaurs! is a cute little defense tower game. It's challenging. But it's not frustrating. You can decide how hard it is by choosing your weapons and goals. So there will be no point where you get stuck. Unless you really want to achieve something. But you could move on. Later you can reach that goal more easily with stronger weapons. It's a solid and nicely balanced game. If you try to achieve everything you will get a decent playing time.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989844022', 'num_games_owned': 624, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 764, 'last_played': 1374702705}
review: Played PvZ so many times, but this just seems to be more interesting to me! I have to save my BBQ (and not my brain), and it needs more logic. I hope there will be some more levels, because 60 is not enough! So far the best game I bought in 2013!

author: {'steamid': '76561198041503891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1626204005}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028328615', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1375544152}
review: I love tower defense games, but they often get very formulaic and it can be hard to find genuine innovation. GHD isn't groundbreaking by any means, but the Tetris-like element that demands adaptation to each unique map avoids rote overuse of one or two overpowered towers. Add to the mix a host of charming graphics, campy and hilarious voice acting, and freaking DINOSAURS, and you've got yourself a winning combination.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998672218', 'num_games_owned': 967, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1495858364}
review: Cute little tower defense game that is a bit harder than you might expect!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971821423', 'num_games_owned': 1202, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 631, 'last_played': 1383162814}
review: "Go Home Dinosaurs!" es un tower defense sin demasiadas pretensiones que termina enganchando precisamente por su sencillez. No es demasiado largo ni excesivamente difícil de completar, pero conseguir la máxima puntuación en todos los niveles es un desafío que te tendrá enganchado durante más tiempo del que admitirás haber jugado.

review: ลองเล่นตามตากั๊กดู  เฮ๊ย เกมมันสนุกใช้ได้เลย  Tower Defense  เกมนี้ออกแบบตัวละครและเนื้อหาได้น่ารักน่าชัง  ผนวกเข้ากับการใช้พื้นที่อย่างจำกัดในแบบ Puzzle ( คล้ายๆ Tetris ) ระบบการเล่นเข้าใจง่ายมากและฉากนึงค่อนข้างสั้นตามแบบฉบับเกมของ Tablet ( ลง iOS ด้วย )  8/10 ครับ เล่นแล้วติดพอสมควร

author: {'steamid': '76561198087180801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 782, 'last_played': 1509781862}
review:
It's childish, colourful, but surprisingly challenging to complete. A tower defence game with a Tetris style mechanic which allows you to arrange your towers within the available space.

It won't change your life, but for the price you'll find it at, definitely something to entertain you for a few hours. Great for playing while listening to music.

If you are bothered by the childish side of it, go to the menu and mute the voices - it makes it much better.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071293483', 'num_games_owned': 230, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1428856206}
review: Zábavná defense hra, ve které máte za úkol ochránit stejky před hordou dinosaurů. každá mise vyžaduje jinou taktiku. Za nasbírané zlaťáky můžete nakoupit speciální zbraně, nebo skiny. Hodnocení 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009288156', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1374314871}
review: Tower Defense en 2D vu de dessus, où le but est de protéger le barbecue d'une bande de marmottes contre des hordes de dinosaures affamés. Vous incarnez une marmotte que vous placez où vous voulez et attaquez l'ennemi, ainsi que divers pièges défensifs qui sont utilisables et déblocables en cours de jeu, accompagnés de bonus temporaires monnayables via des pièces que l'on récupère en partie. Un bon paquet de niveaux (entre 30 et 50), des graphismes enfantins, quant à la difficulté, elle est assez corsée et il faudra de nombreux essais pour faire des perfects. Quelques succès Steam, une durée de vie sympa pour un petit jeu de ce genre, une interface simple, bref, à petit prix c'est une bonne affaire. A recommander pour les fans de Tower Defense.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990261722', 'num_games_owned': 5405, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1011, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 999, 'last_played': 1511708193}
review:
Go Home Dinosaurs is a solid tower defense game with a fun and childish skin. Beating a level is quite simplistic but perfecting each level and getting all the achievements takes a surprising amount of skill. They've found a really unique blend that appeals to people of low and high skill alike.

I initially got it in part for the trading cards and was pleasantly surprised by how much fun I had with it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054873761', 'num_games_owned': 900, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1041, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1041, 'last_played': 1389455933}
review: Рекомендую игру всем любителям TowerDefense!  Никогда бы не купил её просто так, но карточки и скидка сделали своё дело. Убогий графический дизайн в стиле десткого сада. Ущербные звуки и музыка. Но! В игру интересно играть, в ней надо волочать мозгами (по минимуму). Интересная находка  разработчиков - башни имеют форму тетриса и дополнительно нагружают мозги работой. Уровни можно проходить по разному - проверено, кайф возрастает. Сюжет веселый, сама игра веселая. Рекомендую и берите по скидке - именно столько она и стоит. Поиграть, поржать и забыть )

author: {'steamid': '76561198034869131', 'num_games_owned': 897, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1356, 'last_played': 1372483677}
review: เกมแนว Tower Defend ที่ค่อนข้างสนุก Achievements เก็บให้ครบได้ไม่ยากนัก

author: {'steamid': '76561198002518269', 'num_games_owned': 2042, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1372117708}
review: A fun little tower defense game, with a funny premise (you are gophers, having a bbq and dinosaurs attack - don't question it).  Many traditional elements (slowing towers, gun towers, meteor type towers, etc), but some fun twists.  You control a gopher who has to collect money (coconuts) to build new towers, but you can also attack, and you can use power ups to enhance your attack.  So it becomes a balance between building towers and spending your money  to give yourself powerups.  60 levels with 3 boss levels.  Pretty fun on sale - def has a 'mobile game' feel - with 3 stars (steaks) to earn for each level.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067318135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1955, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1395, 'last_played': 1682785412}
review: Basic and Repetitive, But Love The Art Style And The Film References!

author: {'steamid': '76561197987744283', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 581, 'last_played': 1373345353}
review: kill hordes of dinosaurs with lasers, meteors, music, and snowballs in the puzzle, TD hybrid. Can you keep your steaks safe from these cretaceous carnivores?

author: {'steamid': '76561197981047937', 'num_games_owned': 7431, 'num_reviews': 437, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1372024155}
review:
Charming little tower defense game with less of a resource management scramble, and more of a "How do I fit my tetris-block shaped tower pieces onto this field to best use the terrain I have available to me?" puzzle to each stage. Not that one or two still don't come down to juggling reflexes, but so much more goes into the pre-mission planning in this game than you'd expect.

Also: don't try to three-steak everything first go, you can bring powerups from later in the game back to earlier levels as you unlock your arsenal. It's so much nicer to try when you have a full deck in your hand composed of crazy super-science than "I got three gophers with rocks".

author: {'steamid': '76561197989390070', 'num_games_owned': 2291, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1372004130}
review: This is 100% a standard tower defense game, but it's actually quite a lot of fun. It doesn't mix up the typical flavour at all, but it's charming and entertaining enough. It's fun to play, has plenty of variety, and there are dinosaurs.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962287503', 'num_games_owned': 5184, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1106, 'last_played': 1372077662}
review:
Everything to love about tower defense, minus the leveling of towers. This takes gameplay elements from Planets VS Zombies and Tetris. Yes, Tetris. Your towers are shaped like the blocks from the famous puzzle game we all know and love.

This game also manages to stay up to date with the way Tower Defense seems to be heading these days, i.e. a fake microtransaction shop and spells to launch at the enemy. 

So what're you waiting for? Go send some Dinasours back home! (... and earn some steam cards while you're at it.)

author: {'steamid': '76561197981052853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1371899732}
review:
いたってシンプルなタワーディフェンスゲーム。

ストーリーは、モグラ人間達がＢＢＱ（バーベキュー）パーティーをしていると、その匂いに釣られて恐竜が乱入。
恐竜達はモグラ人間には目もくれず、猪突猛進よろしくな感じでＢＢＱを奪おうと迫ってくる。
僕らのＢＢＱを守るんだ！と一致団結したモグラ人間達が「恐竜どもは家に帰れ！」と喚きながら押し寄せる恐竜を皆殺しにする。

特徴として、設置できるタワーはレベル開始前に選択したものだけ。
出現する恐竜の種類とマップはあらかじめ確認することができるので、良く考えて持って行くタワーを選定しよう。

２～３時間はこれで暇を潰せる。

author: {'steamid': '76561198017902658', 'num_games_owned': 695, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 1211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1146, 'last_played': 1561601192}
review:
I like tower defense games so I picked this up. It's a little different from other TD games because the traps use blocks in different shapes so you can't place one anywhere. There is only one end point. It means you can just focus on one point. Rest assured this is NOT easy at all especially if you have not unlocked the more powerful traps and power ups. And also, you get a cute little guy running around assisting in attacks and picking up coconuts for traps.

The small size of each map also adds to the challenge because you can’t spam traps and you have to be careful about placement. You CANNOT delete traps you've placed. Before each mission starts the game makes you pick a few traps or power ups using up to 9 slots. You can only use each trap or power up once so you can only have up to 9 traps in the game. If you want power ups, the traps will be even lesser.

The missions are fun and the maps are interesting and challenging. They are not very big or long to play like other TD games but this means you can just jump in and pop a few rounds. The dinosaurs come in enough variety. However, some dinos are insanely hard to kill unless you use the right traps or find the right combo.

Overall, I would highly recommend this. I'd say this is one of the most entertaining TD games I've played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001046455', 'num_games_owned': 13149, 'num_reviews': 349, 'playtime_forever': 854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 768, 'last_played': 1371944377}
review:
Fairly easy basic tower defense game. You place defenses that each take certain shapes and try to stop all the dinos all moving on the same path before they get to your barbeque,. There is about ten different enemies, only one of which has a variety within the type, so most of the time an enemy of certain kind will behave the usual way - there's no scaling for but one enemy type.

Game takes something like 6 hours to complete, but the two last achievements have to be grinded for several hours of more dino rampage. This can be tiresome, but overall the game is decent if you like the tower defense genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994662237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 739, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 738, 'last_played': 1593558385}
review: A tower defense game that seems to be very heavily inspired by Plants vs Zombies. Also, this is one of those hybrid TD games where, in addition to the towers you can build, your character takes direct part in the action and has his own powers. The humor is laid on pretty thick and can get a little repetitive after a while, but overall beat my expectations for what seems like an iOS to PC port.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061534276', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1371954569}
review: Todd Rex wants YOUR steak. Are you gonna let him take it? No way! Go Home, Dinosaurs! The game is surprisingly fun and addictive. It truly has a bunch of adorable characters too. It is quite cute and simple at first, Yet, It get's fairly challenging as the game progresses.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009392905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 751, 'last_played': 1668817067}
review: Yes, I bought the game for the cards... but I did check the reviews first. And I was not disappointed. Reminds me very much of a casual tower defense like Plants vs Zombies, except the focus is instead on not just choosing defenses that would suit the enemy, but also the playfield as well. Unlike PvZ, the layout of each level is very different, and to position your defenses is somewhat like tetris in that each one has a specific shape, and you can build around the shapes to form the perfect defense. I'd definitely recommend this game to fans of PvZ. It feels similar, yet its very different in playstyle, and I feel it's more challenging.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030953901', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1372135221}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007554934', 'num_games_owned': 734, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 875, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 809, 'last_played': 1392885303}
review:
Go Home Dinosaurs is a great Tower Defence game for all ages. The art style makes it very appealing for younger audiences, while the pop culture references (gophers quoting Full Metal Jacket among others) should provide quite a few laughs to older players.
With 60 levels to beat the game has a good length and trying to "3-steak" all of them should keep people busy a while longer.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987755126', 'num_games_owned': 1731, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 1122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1122, 'last_played': 1437047505}
review:
Réédition de mon ancien [Test][PC] Go Home Dinosaurs!


    Editeur(s) / Développeur(s) : Fire Hose Games
    Sortie France : 14 Mars 2013
    Genre(s) : Stratégie / Tower Défense
    Classification : +3 ans
    Mode(s) : Jouable en solo
    Nombre maximum de joueurs : non
    Web : Site officiel


Todd Rex veut votre steak. Todd Rex veut votre steak. Tu vas le laisser prendre? Pas moyen ! Rentrez chez vous, dinosaures! Empêcher les hordes de pillards Dinos de s'écraser sur votre BBQ dans Go Home Dinosaurs !

Un petit Tower Defense Games Sympa et délirant.

La prise en main est pour le moins simplissime puisque vous avez seulement besoin de votre souris. Il faudra ensuite un espace quadrillé, et les défenses sont représentées par des cartes et un symbole a la manière du jeu TETRIS pour monter la forme et le nombre d'espace quadrillé requis.


- Graphiquement honnête
- Bonne ambiance sonore


Pas de problèmes de réalisation, c'est un bon petit jeu sans prise de tête !

15/20

author: {'steamid': '76561197971824969', 'num_games_owned': 3155, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1375658857}
review:
[Spoiler-Free Review]

Go Home Dinosaurs is yet another me-too tower defense game bringing very little new to the genre. Simply put, it's shovelware, a game that doesn't need to exist, and it gets disgustingly boring after the first 10 minutes (if that).

The characters are smug and annoying (borderline obnoxious) critterz who only serve to remind you of your mistake in purchasing this game. I wish I could deactivate it from my account and get my money back, it's probably the worst game I've played on Steam.

If I'm missing something here, please, somebody, enlighten me. Why does this game exist if not to exploit us as mindless consumers who only serve to make others money?

author: {'steamid': '76561198010201020', 'num_games_owned': 1811, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1370550041}
review:
Solid puzzle/TD game. Towers are all shaped differently and each level is designed in ways to make the player figure out how to place the towers in the limited spaces. There's a couple of active elements to the game as well, you have a main character who can attack enemies in a small aoe around him (an extremley useful tactic if you're going for 3 stars on each level) and collect coconuts, which are the resource for the game.
I have two issues with the game - One, it's a bit too easy. I three starred every level with little difficulty.  Two, there's very little dinosaur variety. Asides from bosses and one or so regular enemy, the only differences between the enemies are their HP and speed, which is quite disappointing when compared to other TDs. Despite that, it's an enjoyable game, and if you're fan of games like Plants VS Zombies it's worth checking out at the very least.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022655951', 'num_games_owned': 2097, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 1065, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 460, 'last_played': 1374664713}
review: If you like tower defense games, you'll enjoy this.  A unique take on the genre, you get to control one main character, collecting coconuts as you go to buy the towers to defend your grill.  (Really.)  The spin on it though is that the towers you place are Tetris style blocks, so you have to plan ahead to get the most of the available space you have.  Not only that, but you only have so many towers you can place per level because each is represented as a "card" in your deck, and you can only have so many cards in your deck at a time.  Hard to explain, fun to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979084213', 'num_games_owned': 4498, 'num_reviews': 1009, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1370554321}
review:
Don't expect another Plants Vs Zombies, Anomaly or Defense Grid here. It's a mix of all of them. But it looks and plays like Plants Vs Zombies the most I guess, graphically and gameplay wise. It's not bad, but not so good either. Instead, wait for Plants Vs Zombies 2, which should release in just a couple of months. I'm sure it will be much more fun and, therefore, worth the wait.

[Rating: 67/100]

author: {'steamid': '76561197986373795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1364799600}
review:
Super cute and fun tower defense game. I played it at PAX East and was charmed instantly. Lots of inspiration from Plants Vs. Zombies, in the best ways: excellent visual typing, clever strategy in the way you choose loadouts for the mission, and sly humor. The oddly shaped towers add an extra layer, where you try to squeeze as much firepower as you can into the space you get. 

If you like tower defense at all, I highly recommend you check it out!
